horstmann.ch02_mail
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  horstmann.ch02_mail.Connection

public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object

Connects a phone to the mail system. The purpose of this class is to keep track of the state of a connection, since the phone itself is just a source of individual key presses.
